QuestData.Title: Surrogate Wings
QuestData.Description:
It is not my way to coddle the young of my brood. But I think I will make an exception for your little one.
After all, I have seen you tend to him. It would be cruel to let your... efforts... go to waste.
Venture into Zuldazar city proper and find something that can act as a surrogate wing for your young one.
Wingminder Goja will know what to do next. Speak to him once you have it.
